H0.text: philadelphia is known as the city of what. City of Freedom

H1.text: philadelphia is known as the city of what. The City of Cheesesteaks

H2.text: philadelphia is known as the city of what. City of Liberty

H3.text: philadelphia is known as the city of what. Brotherly Love

A4.text: As a Quaker, Penn had experienced religious persecution and wanted his colony to be a place where anyone could worship freely.

A5.text: This tolerance, which exceeded that of other colonies, led to better relations with the local native tribes and fostered Philadelphia's rapid growth into America's most important city.
